creditline: The Ruth Ann Dayton Chinese Room Endowment Fund, The Suzanne S. Roberts Fund for Asian Art, and The Helen Jones Fund for Asian Art
description: unlined cerise rectangle with pictorial corss stitch embroidery; two sides and bottom have floral and fauna embroidery on white in purples, blue, greens and gold; inner border tape of green embroidery; blue binding on three edges
title: Embroidered Hanging
